titleStmt.title: Mercurius academicus communicating the intelligence and affairs of Oxford to the rest of the passive party throwout the Kingdom : From Munday in Easter-week to Saturday the 15 of April, anno 1648.
titleStmt.author: Swadlin, Thomas, 1600-1670.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Thomas Swadlin.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
